text: Rolf Åke Mikael Nyqvist (8 November 1960 - 27 June 2017) was a Swedish actor. Born in Stockholm, he studied drama in Malmö. He started acting as Officer Banck in the series one of the Swedish movies about Martin Beck in 1997. Nyqvist became known internationally as the main character Mikael Blomkvist in the Millenium miniseries opposite Noomi Rapace. He also had a role in Mission: Impossible – Ghost Protocol and John Wick. Nyqvist died on 27 June 2017 in Stockholm from lung cancer at the age of 56. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Sweden Category:Swedish movie actors Category:Swedish television actors Category:Swedish stage actors Category:Actors from Stockholm
title: Michael Nyqvist
